Cancel.description: The actions cancel the uploaded image file.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Cancel.longDescription: This defines the name of the custom action supported when used in conjunction with a POST operation to this resource. When issued, this operation will perform a cancel action to the firmware inventory process.

Upload.description: The actions upload an image file.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Upload.longDescription: This defines the name of the custom action supported when used in conjunction with a POST operation to this resource. When issued, this operation will perform a upload action to the firmware inventory process.

SmcFirmwareInventory.description: This is the schema definition for the Update Service. It represents the properties for the service itself and has link to a collection of inventory.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SmcFirmwareInventory.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an Update Service for a Redfish implementation. It represents the properties that affect the service itself and all update packages.

DeviceInstance.description: An opaque string to uniquely identify an instance of a device class.
DeviceInstance.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an opaque string to uniquely identify an instance of a device class. For example, UEFI Device Path, UUID, MAC Address.

RelatedItem.description: The IDs of the Resources associated with this software inventory item.
RelatedItem.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of IDs for pointers consistent with JSON Pointer syntax to the Resource that is associated with this software inventory item.

Actions.description: The Actions object contains the available custom actions on this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Oem.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

Updateable.description: Indicates whether this firmware can be updated by the update service.
Updateable.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this firmware can be updated by the update service. If false, this firmware is for reporting purpose only.

Version.description: A string representing the version of this firmware.
Version.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a string representing the version of this firmware.

VersionSequence.description: A description of the version string structure or format.
VersionSequence.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a description of the version string structure or format.

DeviceClass.description: A unique identifier for the device class associated with this firmware.
DeviceClass.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a unique identifier for the device class associated with this inventory. For example, UEFI GUID or similar.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

DeviceContext.description: An opaque string to provide context for the device class.
DeviceContext.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an opaque string to provide context for the device class. For example, PCI bus 0 Device 19.

Update.description: The actions update an image file.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Update.longDescription: This defines the name of the custom action supported when used in conjunction with a POST operation to this resource. When issued, this operation will perform a update action to the firmware inventory process.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

EnterUpdateMode.longDescription: This defines the name of the custom action supported when used in conjunction with a POST operation to this resource. When issued, this operation will perform a enter update mode action to the firmware inventory process.
